## MatchManager.fetch() method

Fetch a match by its ID.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
fetch(id: string, options?: {
        force: boolean;
    }): Promise<Match>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  id | string | The ID of the match |
|  options | { force: boolean; } | <i>(Optional)</i> The basic fetch options |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[Match](./shieldbow.match.md)<!-- -->&gt;
